thread.title: FTSE 250 movers: Jimmy Choo boosted by Barclays coverage, Synthomer lower on disappointing profits
thread.title_full: FTSE 250 movers: Jimmy Choo boosted by Barclays coverage, Synthomer lower on disappointing profits

title: FTSE 250 movers: Jimmy Choo boosted by Barclays coverage, Synthomer lower on disappointing profits
text:
106.50 -5.4000 
LONDON (ShareCast) - Mid-caps were trading slightly higher on Thursday, though weakness in the industrial metals, transport and technology provided a drag on gains. As of 16:00 BST, the FTSE 250 was trading 0.2% higher at 17,674. 
Jimmy Choo (LSE: CHOO.L - news ) was trading higher after Barclays (LSE: BARC.L - news ) initiated coverage on the stock with an 'overweight' recommendation and a price target of 208p on expectations of stronger growth than its sector peers. 
Outsourcer Serco was extending gains made on Wednesday following a strong first-half trading update, as Numis raised its rating on the stock to 'hold'. 
Synthomer dipped as operating profits in its European and North American divisions tumbled , due to weak demand and higher raw material prices. 
Hunting (LSE: HTG.L - news ) declined as it revealed its operating profit plunged in the first half amid a declining rig count and lower oil prices. 
Miners Evraz , Lonmin (LSE: LMI.L - news ) and Acacia Mining (LSE: ACA.L - news ) were trading in the red as metal prices tentatively recovered from a three-day decline. 
Risers Serco Group (Other OTC: SECCF - news ) (SRP) 131.60p +11.53% BTG (BTG (LSE: BTG.L - news ) ) 684.50p +9.00% Jimmy Choo (CHOO) 170.00p +8.42% Supergroup (Stuttgart: 49S.SG - news ) (SGP) 1,287.00p +4.72% Keller Group (LSE: KLR.L - news ) (KLR) 1,066.00p +4.20% Ted Baker (Other OTC: TBAKF - news ) (TED) 3,037.00p +4.15% Cineworld Group (LSE: CINE.L - news ) (CINE) 479.20p +3.97% Redrow (RDW) 460.00p +3.86% Drax Group (LSE: DRX.L - news ) (DRX) 361.50p +3.82% AA (AA.) 383.40p +3.43% Fallers Evraz (EVR) 113.10p -8.20% Hunting (HTG) 576.50p -5.49% Zoopla Property Group (WI) (ZPLA) 264.80p -4.75% Lonmin (LMI) 106.70p -4.65% ICAP (IAP) 505.00p -4.63% Homeserve (HSV) 425.00p -3.47% Foxtons Group (LSE: FOXT.L - news ) (FOXT) 229.60p -3.08% Acacia Mining (ACA) 292.90p -2.98% Alent (ALNT) 362.90p -2.66% Grainger (GRI (Shanghai: 600894.SS - news ) ) 223.10p -2.45%
